featureType.name: watersource
featureType.title: watersource
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: watersource
virtualTable.sql: SELECT a.watersource_id as "Water Source ID" , a.wss_id as "WSS ID" , b.wss_name as "WSS Name" , a.source_type as "Source Type" , a.discharge as "Discharge" , a.construction_year "Construction Year" , a.rehabilitation_year as "Rehabilitation Year" , CASE WHEN a.water_meter = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Meter Installation" , a.observation as "Observation" , a.input_date as "Inputted Date" , a.geom , a.elevation as "Elevation" ,CASE WHEN a.chlorination_unit = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Installation of Chlorination Unit" ,CASE WHEN a.source_protected = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Source Protected" , a.status as "status" FROM watersource a INNER JOIN wss b ON a.wss_id = b.wss_id
